MajorClaims.Text: it is sensible to enforce the gun control
the guns should be strictly limited and the government should enforce a series of laws to prevent our societies from violence

Claims.Text: considering the rise in accident rates, violent crime rates and suicide rates
most violent crimes are related to the abuse of guns, especially in some countries where guns are available for people
the fewer guns possessed, the fewer accidents would happened, our surroundings would be safer with lower accident rates
the possession of guns can also raise the rates of suicide

Premises.Text: guns will create a violent society if the trend continues
in American, young adults and even juveniles can get access to guns, which leads to the tragedies of school gun shooting
some terrorists are able to possess more advanced weapons than the police, which makes citizens always live in danger
The accidents cannot be completely avoided although only those who have gun licenses can purchase guns
we hear some news from time to time that someone was hurt by accident during the hunting
In the US, firearms remain the most common method of suicide, accounting for about 50 per cent
there is an increasing trend of adolescent suicides and suicides among those age 75 and over
